forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 46F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
